description:
Missing network information (nw_info) stored in the 'instance_info_caches' DB table was failing to be successfully healed by the _heal_instance_info_cache() periodic task.  The periodic task correctly fires and gets the nw_info to update, but the DB call to instance_info_cache_update() fails to save the values.

Correctly handle both updating and adding missing nw_info.
title: Missing info_cache.save() in db sqlalchemy api

comments.content:
Missing network information (nw_info) stored in the 'instance_info_caches' DB table was failing to be successfully healed by the _heal_instance_info_cache() periodic task.  The periodic task correctly fires and gets the nw_info to update, but the DB call to instance_info_cache_update() fails to save the values.

Correctly handle both updating and adding missing nw_info.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mathrock

comments.content: This issue can be re-created by dropping all entries in the 'instance_info_caches' DB table and waiting for the compute node's _heal_instance_info_cache() periodic task to fire.  You'll see the log stating that it updated the info_cache but checking the DB shows that it did not in fact persist the data and silently failed.
